about_the_game: Stagehand Survival Simulator is a Simulation style game that takes you backstage!  You are a stagehand that finds work in a small town that is holding a summer concert festival. You are tasked to learn, craft and survive the summer season. You will meet and learn from  the people who work  backstage in the video, audio, rigging, lighting and staging departments. You will craft various stage gear and create a full concert set and run the show! Earn enough cash to rent an apartment and become a journeyman and remember, the show must go on!
detailed_description: Stagehand Survival Simulator is a Simulation style game that takes you backstage!  You are a stagehand that finds work in a small town that is holding a summer concert festival. You are tasked to learn, craft and survive the summer season. You will meet and learn from  the people who work  backstage in the video, audio, rigging, lighting and staging departments. You will craft various stage gear and create a full concert set and run the show! Earn enough cash to rent an apartment and become a journeyman and remember, the show must go on!
name: Stagehand Survival Simulator Demo
short_description: Simulator style game that takes you behind the scenes of the entertainment concert industry.
